title: IAID Calculator
subtitle: Calculate Identity Association Identifier (IAID) for DHCPv6 interfaces. Generate IAIDs from interface index, name, MAC address, or custom values with OS-specific conventions.

config.title: IAID Configuration
config.hint: Select method to generate Identity Association Identifier

interfaceName.label: Interface Name
interfaceName.hint: Network interface name (will be hashed to generate IAID)

macAddress.label: MAC Address
macAddress.hint: Hardware address (last 4 bytes used for IAID)

osConventions.title: OS-Specific Conventions
osConventions.hint: How different operating systems typically generate IAIDs

namingGuide.title: Network Interface Naming Guide
namingGuide.hint: Common interface naming conventions across different operating systems
